text: David Yutaka Ige (born January 15, 1957) is an American politician. He was the eighth Governor of Hawaii from 2014 to 2022. A Democrat, he previously served in the Hawaii State Senate, representing the 16th district, from 1995 to 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * David Ige for Governor Official campaign site * Office of the Governor, State of Hawaii "Hawaii governor's office site" Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Hawaii Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa alumni
title: David Ige
